Name: Today
Description: Transactions through {today}, plus payee matching rules, and a budget.

Name: Full Year Sample Data
Description: Includes 12 months of transactions, payee matching rules, and a budget.

Name: Transactions to Today
Description: Transactions only up to {today}. No payees or budget.

Name: Full Year Transactions
Description: Complete year of transactions only. No payees or budget.

Name: Budget Only
Description: Transactions only up to {today}. No payees or budget.

Name: Payee Matching Rules Only
Description: Only payee matching rules. Helpful to see how payee matching works with OFX import.
